page.title: 18How We Did It!
page.content: Our teacher put us into groups of about three or four people. Then we thought of subjects and put them on the board. Like, for instance, pets and each group chose which subject they would like to do about. Our group did about food. For about three times a week each group tried to produce something about their subject. But first we could write questions for other people in the school to answer if we wanted. We put down questions about what our group was doing and then the rest of the school answered them on a questionnaire. Then we did writing about that and fed it into the computer. We went on some walks, one to the Industral Estate and another near the Chipboard Factory. We also had to count all the amenities in our area like hospitals, and this was shared out between our groups.
